text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
This place sounds good～! There's 30 Miles of freedom! 
……and this one, has about 20 Miles of thrills.

It was a few days before Summer Training Camp. Today, the two of 
us were planning on how to spend the one day off we would get.

After scrolling, I turned my laptop towards her. I had found some 
leisure-related facilities that would be near the training camp.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Ah! 
This mark, the Mile rewards……!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! +100 Miles, Trainer-san! 
……On our day off, let's go here!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-saaaan, here I go! Get the camera ready! 
——One, two!
(SPLASH!)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Puha-! The water slide was fun! 
It gets you really pumped up! Maybe 50 Miles worth!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san! Next, let's do that one together! 
『Carrot Boat★Rendezvous』!

Gran Alegria and I were enjoying summer to the fullest. 
Swimming, floating, diving, we enjoyed it all……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Mmm～～～～! 
This salad is 100 Miles of deliciousness……!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Crunchy, leafy lettuce mixed with brightly colored green and yellow 
veggies! Fried onions for texture and flavor! It's perfect!
choice_data_list: This is good too, 120 Miles worth!
This is good too, 120 Miles worth!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Eeh, that good!? 
……After finishing this MiRule meal, I'll try ordering that!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……Puha～～! I ate a lot～! 
With this, I'll have Infinite Miles-worth of energy!

While watching her finish her dessert frappe, 
I pulled a memopad out of my bag.
choice_data_list: Let's see, the Miles I've earned……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ! Trainer-san, that memopad, is it perhaps……

I nodded in response to Gran Alegria's expectant gaze. 
……That's right. It was the same as her 『Mile Memo』!
choice_data_list: Just using a phone is boring

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Ah-! I get that feeling! There's a sense of excitement when writing 
by hand and a sense of accomplishment when reading through it!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu! 
Trainer-san, you're already a proper Miler now too, huh!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Alright! Just like this, we'll keep the fun coming, and save up 
those Miles! Because this is a great place to build up the Miles!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Then, next up is……yeah!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
『Tropical Vacation Area』! We've played a lot, 
so next let's take it easy with some Vacation Time!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Waah……!
choice_data_list: It's like we're really down south!
It's like we're really down south!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! 100……no! 
It's 1000 Miles of surprising!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
It seems like it's modeled after a real overseas resort! 
It was written in the pamphlet!
choice_data_list: Oooh, so it's a real place!
Oooh, so it's a real place!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
If it's 1000 Miles of surprise here then……how many Miles do 
you think the real thing will be? It makes you wonder, doesn't it!?

For a rookie trainer like me…… 
There'd be all kinds of hurdles.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, you think so? 
If the two of us go together, I don't think it'll be that hard!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: After all, we've got Miles don't we!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
With two peoples' worth of Miles, we could definitely go! 
When it comes to English, I can act as a translator!

——It was the day I learned that Gran Alegria was saving 
up her Miles. I was pretty sure she said this——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
? Yeah! 
If I spend them, there'll be less of them!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Except maybe when they're about to expire, I guess? 
But, not until the very end! Otherwise they'll decrease!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Of course, even now that won't change! 
But, you see……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
If I'm together with Trainer-san then, it might be fine. 
I started thinking I wanted to spend them.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Because……that's where MiLove is!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Yeah, MiLove!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember? Before, 
when Trainer-san used your Miles to treat me to that cake.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That day, it's true that Trainer-san's Miles disappeared. 
But……they still remain with me here.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san's MiLove, 『It's the materialization of all 
those Miles』. It took on the form of these feelings and remained!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……Miles change their form. Those that love Miles, 
are thankful of those Miles, the moment they use those Miles——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
It becomes something you can't see, 
that remains in your heart, and——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: They become Miles that will never disappear!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: That's why, let's go to that Southern Island!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
For all the hard work we do, a vacation reward! Everything 
we've gathered together, the materialization of that MiLove!

Her words left a warm feeling in my chest. 
Before I realized it, I was nodding.
choice_data_list: Yeah, we'll go someday for sure!
Yeah, we'll go someday for sure!

text_block_list.text:
It may take us a while, 
but someday, definitely……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: No matter how long it takes, it'll be fine!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
After all, even if I graduate from Tracen Academy, 
the Miles will still be there.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
The bond created by those Miles, 
between Trainer-san and me, will be there!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: So there's no expiration date on this promise!
